title: A photograph of a shop front
content:
I'm currently designing a website for a local butchers, the guy can't remember the font type on his shops signage and the company that made it are no longer in business.

My design skills are not up to scratch with typography suffering the most :/

I'm looking for an exact or very close match to this as he claims it to be essentially his branding.

This guy has three shop fronts like this and it is only fitting i reference it on his new website..

Any help is appreciated.

Thanks in advance,  
Karl

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062912im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Shop-front-signage_3557.jpg)

Font: 

 Clarendon MTI 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062912/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Warble
